# ios Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "ios" {
  host     = "192.168.100.200"
  port     = 22
  username = "admin"
  password = "MyStrongPassword"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String)
- `port` (Number)

### Optional

- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
